title: Christopher Simmons
content:
[Index](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415223043/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Index)

Christopher Simmons is a San Francisco based graphic designer. He is an emeritus President of the San Francisco chapter of the [AIGA](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415223043/http:/typophile.com/wiki/AIGA) and served on it's board in previous terms. In 2004 he left Alterpop to form the studio, MINE. He is the author of [Logo Lab](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415223043/http:/www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/1581805497/mine0b-20), and judged [Letterhead and Logo Design 9](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415223043/http:/www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/redirect?tag=mine0b-20&creative=9325&camp=1789&link_code=ur2&path=tg/detail/-/1592531822/qid=1115067304/sr=1-1/ref=sr_1_1?v=glance%26s=books), also authoring and designing the annual of the same name.

Christopher designed the [2005 "Gas, Food, Type" Typophile tee](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415223043/http:/typophile.bigcartel.com/).

URL: [http://www.minesf.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415223043/http:/www.minesf.com/ "http://www.minesf.com")
author: cchs
